index.name: csharp
index.subtitle: C#
index.about: C# is an elegant and type-safe object-oriented language that enables developers to build a variety of secure and robust applications that run on the .NET Framework. You can use C# to create Windows client applications, XML Web services, distributed components, client-server applications, database applications, and much, much more.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about C# language and Visual Studio IDE.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 1 - Introduction/IDE
videos.description: This video is an introduction about C# language and Visual Studio IDE.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 2 - First program
videos.description: This video explains how to build your first program using C#.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 3 - Variables and Data types
videos.description: This video explains C# variables and data types.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 4 - Operators (Mathematical and Logical)
videos.description: This video will teach you about how to use mathematical operators and logical operators of C# language.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 5 - if/else statement
videos.description: This video is about how to use if/else statement in C#.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 6 - Nested if/else statement
videos.description: This video is about how to use nested if/else statement in C#.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 7 - Switch statement
videos.description: This video is about how to use switch statement in C#.

videos.title: C# Tutorial 8 - Arrays
videos.description: This video is about how to create and use arrays in C#.
